en.content: You round an outcrop to find the man has disappeared. The ridge extends much further to the west, and the outer edge leads to a dangerous drop. You have lost him.

text.content: You may make a Hard Spot Hidden roll.

zh.content: 你转过一块庄稼地，发现这男人已经消失了。山脊延伸到西面的远方，边缘最外面连接着一片危险的断崖。你跟丢了他。

text.content: 你可以进行一次困难「侦查」检定。

text.en: You think he may have escaped from the hidden stairway
text.zh: 你认为他可能是从隐藏的阶梯逃走了
